items.sentence: It\'s true that she knows a lot about cooking, but she isn\'t a good cook.
Money isn\'t everything, but if you have no money, you can\'t do anything.
Tom and Mary looked at each other, and then suddenly they started kissing.
Tom began to look for a job three months before he graduated from college.
Tom put two slices of bread into the toaster and pushed down on the lever.
